{"id":1502297645,"question_id":3309,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 weeks, 1 day","timestamp":1736372955,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1502297645/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Prefix and Suffix Pairs I","memory":"23.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int countPrefixSuffixPairs(vector<string>& words) {\n        int n = words.size();\n        int ret = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<n-1; i++) {\n            for(int j=i+1; j<n; j++) {\n                if(isPrefixAndSuffix(words[i], words[j]))\n                    ret++;\n            }\n        };\n        return ret;       \n    }\n    bool isPrefixAndSuffix(string str1, string str2) {\n        if(str1.length()> str2.length())\n            return false;\n        int pos = str2.find(str1);\n        if(pos>0 || pos == -1)\n            return false;\n        reverse(str2.begin(), str2.end());\n        reverse(str1.begin(), str1.end());\n        pos = str2.find(str1);\n        if(pos>0 || pos == -1)\n            return false;\n        return true;        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-prefix-and-suffix-pairs-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
